mapper.sql: pid, process, begindt, materielno, addwater, manualfeeding, singleweight, cumulativeweight, vacuumsuction, stir, temperaturecontrol, pressurecontrol, stepnum, recordno, username, countnum
mapper.delete: delete from excel5procedure where begindt BETWEEN #{beginDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into excel5procedure(pid, process, begindt, materielno, addwater, manualfeeding, singleweight, cumulativeweight, vacuumsuction, stir, temperaturecontrol, pressurecontrol, stepnum, recordno, username, countnum) values (#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{materielno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addwater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manualfeeding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singleweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cumulativeweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vacuumsuction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperaturecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pressurecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert.foreach:
insert into excel5procedure (
) SELECT #{item.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.materielno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addwater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.manualfeeding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.singleweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cumulativeweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vacuumsuction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.temperaturecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pressurecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stepnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM excel5procedure WHERE begindt= #{item.begindt,jdbcType=CHAR} and recordno = #{item.recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1 )

mapper.update:
update excel5procedure
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
process = #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begindt = #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR},
materielno = #{materielno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addwater = #{addwater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manualfeeding = #{manualfeeding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
singleweight = #{singleweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cumulativeweight = #{cumulativeweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vacuumsuction = #{vacuumsuction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stir = #{stir,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperaturecontrol = #{temperaturecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pressurecontrol = #{pressurecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stepnum = #{stepnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recordno = #{recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
countnum = #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update excel5procedure set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, process = #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begindt = #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, materielno = #{materielno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addwater = #{addwater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manualfeeding = #{manualfeeding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singleweight = #{singleweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cumulativeweight = #{cumulativeweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vacuumsuction = #{vacuumsuction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stir = #{stir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperaturecontrol = #{temperaturecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pressurecontrol = #{pressurecontrol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stepnum = #{stepnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recordno = #{recordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countnum = #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
